definition: to grab/to catch/to arrest/to snatch/to scratch
variant of 癢|痒[yang3]/to itch/to tickle

sentences.english: I catch a watch in the scratching match.
sentences.chinese: 我在抓痒比赛中抓到一块手表。

sentences.english: Gas Skunk : You can scratch yourself now, Sky-Byte.
sentences.chinese: 你现在可以自己抓痒了，天鲨。

sentences.english: Except for severe conditions, scratching alone is enough.
sentences.chinese: 除严重的条件下，抓痒是足够的。

sentences.english: What has a hand but can't scratch itself?
sentences.chinese: 什么东西有手，但是却没办法抓痒？

sentences.english: But this explanation hardly scratches the surface.
sentences.chinese: 不过，这样解释几乎还只是隔靴抓痒。

sentences.english: Why does he keep scratching himself?
sentences.chinese: 他为什么总是不停地抓痒？

sentences.english: This sensation makes us want to scratch.
sentences.chinese: 这种感觉让我们想要抓痒。

definition: to scratch/to mess about with/to quarrel/to scramble to do/sb or sth that one can rely on
variant of 癢|痒[yang3]/to itch/to tickle
to claw wildly/to scratch frantically/to arrest people indiscriminately
to injure by scratching or clawing
